General.Name: LPI Capital Bhd
General.Description: LPI Capital Bhd, an investment holding company, underwrites general insurance products for individuals and commercial entities in Malaysia, Singapore, and Cambodia. It offers insurance solutions in the areas of employee benefits, health, liability, motor, marine, pecuniary, personal accident, project, property, and trade credit insurance. The company also provides fire, workmen's compensation, aviation, bond, miscellaneous, and engineering insurance products and services. It serves customers through agents. The company was formerly known as London & Pacific Insurance Company Berhad and changed its name to LPI Capital Bhd in May 1999. LPI Capital Bhd was incorporated in 1962 and is headquartered in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia.
